english_example_sentence: When you were a young athlete, you used to win every game easily.
russian_example_sentence: Когда ты был молодым спортсменом, ты легко выигрывал каждую игру.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen, genç bir sporcuyken her maçı kolayca kazanırdın.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen, genç bir sporcuyken her maçı kolayca ______.
